storyInfo: Laios and his party find themselves in a completely foreign area. Never did they imagine that they would immediately be hunted down by a bunch of strange rock slugs and a terrifying armored orc.

attributes.content: Laios... Run!
attributes.name: Falin

attributes.text: The moment she was swallowed whole by the Red Dragon, my sister Falin teleported the rest of us out of the dungeon with her magic.
Our belongings and travel funds were all left behind. However, we had no choice but to venture into the dungeon again to rescue Falin before she's digested.
On our way, we tried eating the monsters we killed to feed ourselves.
It's been tough, but thanks to that, we met new friends, solved all kinds of problems, and learned many new things about the dungeon.
But just as we were venturing deeper, thinking all was going well, we seem to have found ourselves in a new predicament...

attributes.content: Falin!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh... just a dream.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You're finally awake, Laios!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: How are you feeling? Still dizzy?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Not really... but now that you mention it, I am feeling a little hungry.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Where are we...?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The sky, the sun, the woods... and...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Looks like somewhere outside the dungeon, right? But no, it's not. None of us recognize this place at all. Not me, not Senshi, not even Chilchuck.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: And look. I've been getting no response at all... I've tried several times, but the microscopic spirits aren't responding to me.
attributes.name: Marcille
Laios
attributes.content: That's strange...

attributes.name: Laios
attributes.content: Senshi? What are you doing?
attributes.joined: That's strange...Senshi? What are you doing?

attributes.content: Been examining the soil here.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Look, the soil's moist, deep in color, and starts to smell when ya rub it in your palms. Which means it's got a lot of organic matter packed in there.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Meaning?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Meaning it's just perfect for planting! Aye, just like the soil on the back of a golem!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Who cares?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Pipe down, Marcille! You spooked the birds and I almost fell from the tree.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Well, I have good news and bad news. First, we've checked our surroundings, and haven't come across any monsters. This place should be safe.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: What about the good news?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: That was the good news!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: So what's the bad news?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The bad news is this place is huge, and nothing like any environment I'm familiar with.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: From a high vantage point, I could tell we're on the edge of a forest.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I've never seen anywhere like this in the first five floors, and haven't heard about anything like it, either.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Which means...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Which means...?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Did we stumble into a brand new, unknown area of the dungeon?!
attributes.name: Laios's Party

attributes.content: Never seen any of those birds before. Strange. An area of the dungeon? Hmm. Looks more like a whole different place to me.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Could this be similar to... being inside one of those paintings? Were we brought to another world?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Does that mean we'll get to see monsters no one's ever seen before?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And, if we're lucky, to taste them too?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Do you even realize what you're saying?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Our top priority is saving Falin, not wasting our time in whatever this place is!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: And there's one other thing I should mention. I've tried several times now, but I'm only able to use simple magic here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That... could be an issue.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What's more...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: There's more?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Something's off about the forest and this clearing here. As if someone opened up the soil for planting things. I'm quite familiar with methods like that.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You don't care about my magic getting weaker at all, do you?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I did spot some strange wooden huts outside the forest. Maybe there are people living there?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Let's head there and ask around, see if we can learn anything.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Don't change the subject!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Strange wooden huts?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Let's go check them out!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We need to be more cautious. We know nothing about this place.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Who knows what's inside? We might even encounter hostile demi-humans.
attributes.name: Marcille
Chilchuck
attributes.content: I suggest you let me go first to...

attributes.name: Chilchuck
attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.joined: I suggest you let me go first to... Hey!

attributes.content: The huts aren't big, but they've got plenty of fencing. The stakes're all planted firmly into the ground, too. Nice and steady.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The part above the ground are obviously short. Most folks could climb over 'em, no problem. I guess they go deep, to keep animals inside from digging their way out.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I'm also seeing some black rocks scattered all over. Some kind of marker, maybe?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hey! Stop running around like that! What if it's dangerous?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Whispers) Kensuke?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Kensuke reacts to monsters nearby. Does that mean...)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I told you to stop running off already!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ahhhh!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I-It moves! Th-There's something squishy under the rock!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Eeeeek!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I-Is it some kind of insect monster that uses rocks as its shell? So the shell is used for both protection and offense?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey, don't just stand around and watch! Take care of it already!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Its hard outer shell is more than enough protection for its abdomen. It covers the neck too, which usually has a lot of nerves.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It wouldn't be easy to kill it with just our weapons.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille, use your magic!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Keep it as weak as you can. We don't want to harm the environment here!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Don't worry, I can't cast anything stronger than this right now anyway!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmph, they're as weak as walking mushrooms.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: So it is a new type of monster! Are you alright, Marcille? How did its attacks feel?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'm fine. Thanks for worrying about me.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hm... What a hard shell. You don't often see shells made of minerals.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Wh-What about the rest of it?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Flips the Originium slug around with his axe)
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Wha?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Marcille

attributes.content: What? What is it like?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Don't lay a finger on it when we don't even know the first thing about it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Critters that crawl on the ground usually live off of decomposing organic matter. So they're likely to be full of bacteria and parasites. You could get infected just by touching it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: That's true...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Hm? Kensuke? We found the slug already... Is there something else?)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hold on... The rocks around us have all come to life!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: In that case, we'll just have to take them all down!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Haa... Haah... How's this?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Seems like they come in all kinds! Some can spew some sort of fluid! Careful... It seems to be corrosive!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: W-Wow, they can spit corrosive fluids?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You're excited about that right now?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I don't think I can do much damage to these guys. They're all yours!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Quick! We'll hide inside this hut!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Ahhhhhhhh! What the heck?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Senshi, do you know this orc all decked out in armor?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hm, all the orcs I know tend to dress pretty lightly. He must be the owner of the hut. Should I ask?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Ask? Ask what? Let's run for it!!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Senshi, put me down already!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I-Is he chasing us?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What is he, anyway? Is he really an orc?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You sure you don't need me to go and ask?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Why are you people so curious about that? He was obviously hell-bent on slaughtering us with that strange massive blade! We definitely pissed him off!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yeah, probably with your explosion magic! Why don't you try apologizing?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I'm not apologizing to an orc! And how were we supposed to chase off the rock slugs without magic?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: So this is a new place we've never been to! There are so many things to do here!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: For the last time Senshi, I know how to run! Put me down already! Hey
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I've never read anything about this in books either. This is so cool...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Laios!!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ahhhhhhhh!!!
attributes.name: Marcille
